hymn.title: But God commends His own love to us

layout.singingstanza: But God com -- mends His own love to us in that while we were yet sin -- ners, Christ died for us. Much more then, hav -- ing been jus -- ti -- fied now in His blood, we shall be saved through Him from the wrath. For if, while we were en -- e -- mies, we were re -- con -- ciled to God, to God through the death of His Son, much more, much more, hav -- ing been re -- con -- ciled, we shall be saved in His life. We shall be saved in His life.

lyrics.stanza: But God commends His own love to us In that while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
Much more then, having been justified now In His blood, we shall be saved Through Him from the wrath.

For if, while we were enemies, We were reconciled to God, To God through the death of His Son, Much more, much more, Having been reconciled, We shall be saved in His life. We shall be saved in His life.
